channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: The Next Step
channel.desc: With Amy feeling down about missing her family?s annual camping trip, Finn resolves to cheer her up. However, when none of his ideas work, Finn turns to Henry for help. Meanwhile, Lily's efforts to hide a potential scandal from her mother results in disaster when she team up with Kenzie, who can't keep a secret. Ozzy and Izzy prepare a dance for their annual church talent show but clash after Izzy?s request for creative input falls on deaf ears.
